about_the_game:
Custom Content!

You can create, share, or play custom fights using the Steam workshop, Game Banana, or any other mod sharing platforms. Instructions on how to do so are located in the game's files.

What's the deal with this game?

Well, Self Defense Kinda is a unique take on RPGs where this genre gets combined with another genre, that being Boss Rushes!
Constantly introducing new and exciting mechanics to make every fight truly unique from one another. Go from fighting a crazed salesperson, willing to get profits at any costs, to fighting Ads incarnate!








Game Features

- 12 Normal Boss Fights each with their own unique mechanic to think around

- 12 Hard Mode Boss Fights that introduces a new mechanic to make the fight naturally more difficult. (It's not just about more HP or more damage dealt)
- 1 Final Fight with some neat surprises
- Tools to create, share, and play community made custom fights via the Steam Workshop or just by sharing the folder containing the new content.
- If you're stuck there's a hint mode that only guides you in the right direction but doesn't tell you how you should beat the enemy (No punishment if you use it either, just potential shame and friendly jabs by your friends)
- In game achievements for completionists
- Upgrades, Command Powers, No limited Inventory/Items, Skills, and Mini Skills allow personal strategy/adaptability without being overwhelming. But you can also refuse any upgrades or help if you've truly mastered the game. Every fight is possible at base stats.


Story

Alice goes to a store to try out their new BR system. But she didn't realize that by putting on the BR headset she wouldn't be able to take it off afterwards. Now she's told by the BR virtual helper, P.I.N.E, that this world is trying to help her through some subconscious pressures in her life. In order to actually be able to take the headset off, she needs to fix whatever issue was troubling her. On the surface, that issue seems to be proving that she can fend for herself. However, is that really the issue or the real reason she can't take off the headset? Well, the only way to find out is to press on and find answers.


*no cartoon characters were harmed in the making of this game*

name: Self Defense Kinda... Demo
short_description: Use your brain to defeat several unique fights whether base game or custom community made content! Learn from your defeats and overcome your overwhelming foe in this Boss Rush RPG game! Maybe, you can help Alice escape the BR World and learn true Self Defense! eh, don't count on it.
